original_title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Silver Fox Festival
overview: Babymetal continues their fusion of heavy metal, J-pop, and dance in the fourth performance in their Five Fox Festival in Japan tour. The concert, held at Zepp DiverCity in Tokyo on July 25, 2017, was a special fan event. Attendance was restricted to elementary school children and seniors 60 and up.
tagline: The Stay Metal population who go beyond generations and wander the metal galaxiesâ€¦
title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Silver Fox Festival
